post.html:
Creating Initial Services

Create a services folder with the following files:

services/API.js

const API = {
    // url: "https://firtman.github.io/coffeemasters/api/menu.json",
    url: "/data/menu.json",
    fetchMenu: async () => {
        const result = await fetch(API.url);
        return await result.json();
    }
}

export default API;

services/Store.js

import API from './API.js'

const Store = {
    menu: null,
    cart: []
} 

export default Store;

Back in app.js import the two services as modules and create a global app variable.

import Store from './services/Store.js';
import API from './services/API.js';

window.app = {}
app.store = Store;
post.title: Creating Initial Services
